Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.collisions

Interface AABBSideAwareCollided

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AABBCollided, Bounded, DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider
    public interface AABBSideAwareCollided
extends AABBCollided
    A AABBSideAwareCollided represents an YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a Collider and that is aware of which of its side the Collider had collided with. In such a case, the AABBSideAwareCollided is the YaegerEntity thatgets notified of the collision and of the side.

    Each Game world Update a AABBSideAwareCollided is checked against all instances ofCollider. If many instances of Collider are part of the YaegerScene, this could lead to many calculations, which could slow down the game and framerate. Thus ensure only those instances of YaegerEntity that really need to be part of the collision detection implement the AABBSideAwareCollided or Collider interfaces.

    If it is not required to know the side of the collision, implement the AABBCollided interface, which will save you valuable processor time.
